slogan:
Programming is the
modern language of creativity
jobTitle: Comprehensive developer of web and Android applications

whoami.title: who am I
whoami.line1: I have extensive experience spanning more than 4 years in web and Android application development, with a focus on creating and implementing attractive and effective user interfaces. I have worked on a variety of projects including business applications, e-commerce, social media, and distance learning, which has positioned me to understand market requirements and deliver effective solutions that meet customer needs.
whoami.line2: Proficient in using multiple languages ​​and technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, and ExpressJS, with exceptional abilities to solve problems and improve application performance and security. I have the ability to work as part of a team and in multicultural work environments, and I always strive for continuous professional development and use the latest methodologies and technical tools to achieve innovation and improve the user experience.
whoami.line3: I am committed to providing innovative technical solutions that contribute to the success of customer projects and meet their aspirations on an ongoing basis.

review1.name: Ahmed Mohammed
review1.comment: Abdullah is a skilled programmer who quickly understands what is needed. His work is excellent and always delivered on time. I highly recommend working with him.

review2.name: Emily Davis
review2.comment: I have worked with Abdullah on several projects, and he always delivers outstanding work and innovative solutions. He is very cooperative and patient.

review3.name: Omar Ahmed
review3.comment: Abdullah works with great professionalism and attention to detail. He solves problems quickly and effectively. Working with him was an excellent experience.

getInTouch.title: Get In Touch
getInTouch.messagePlaceHolder: What do you have in mind
getInTouch.description: Do you want to work together or want to give your opinion on my work? You can apply here and you will be answered as soon as possible.
getInTouch.successMessage: The message has been sent successfully. You will be answered as soon as possible.
getInTouch.errorMessage: An error occurred while sending the message. Please try again later.

service1.title: Full-Stack Web Development with MERN Stack
service1.description: Building comprehensive web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js.

service2.title: Front-End Development
service2.description: Designing and developing responsive and interactive user interfaces using React.js and SCSS.

service3.title: Back-End Development
service3.description: Creating and managing server-side logic and databases using Node.js and Express.js for scalable applications.

service4.title: RESTful API Development
service4.description: Designing and developing RESTful APIs for seamless integration between different systems.

service5.title: Database Management
service5.description: Designing, optimizing, and managing databases using MongoDB to ensure performance and security.

service6.title: Deployment & Hosting
service6.description: Deploying and hosting applications on platforms like Vercel and Heroku, ensuring stable and secure operations.

service7.title: Android Development with Flutter
service7.description: Designing and developing fully functional Android applications using Flutter with a focus on modern design and user experience.

service8.title: Firebase Integration
service8.description: Integrating Firebase services into Android apps for features like authentication, real-time databases, and push notifications.

service9.title: API Integration
service9.description: Connecting Android apps to external APIs to enable seamless data interaction and extend app functionality.
